sources.title: The Hole in the Wall (1929) EDWARD G. ROBINSONüçï CLAUDETTE COLBERTüçï PRE-CODE HOLLYWOOD
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Stars: Edward G. Robinson, Claudette Colbert, and Nellie Savage
Director: Robert Florey

Step into the gritty world of "The Hole in the Wall," a captivating blend of gangster drama, melodrama, mystery, and spiritualism that is a must-watch for fans of vintage cinema and the early days of Hollywood storytelling.

Edward G. Robinson delivers a riveting performance as a criminal mastermind seeking revenge that became the blueprint for his iconic gangster persona in Little Caesar. Claudette Colbert shines as a cunning spiritualist entangled in a web of deception, mystery, and intrigue. Packed with atmospheric settings, sharp dialogue, and themes of revenge and redemption, this film showcases the fearless storytelling that defined the Pre-Code era.

If you‚Äôre a fan of classic gangster movies and mysteries with a supernatural twist, The Hole in the Wall is a hidden treasure you don‚Äôt want to miss. Perfect for PizzaFLIX enthusiasts and lovers of Edward G. Robinson‚Äôs tough-guy persona. Like, comment, and subscribe to explore more Pre-Code Hollywood classics and cinematic masterpieces!

sources.title: The Hole In The Wall (1929)
sources.description: I've been researching newly public domain films from 1929 and earlier, so I'm uploading the best possible copies that I can find. A remake of a 1921 lost film, The Hole in the Wall is notable for being the first film in which Edward G. Robinson portrayed a gangster. He would later become famous for these kinds of roles. This picture is also remembered for mixing horror and crime drama into one picture, although by modern standards it is quite messy.¬†

metadata.Plot: Mrs. Ramsey sent Jean Oliver to prison on a false charge. To get even, Jean (disguised as Madame Mystera) plans to kidnap her daughter and turn her into a thief. Love entanglements with a gangster known as "The Fox" and newspaperman Grant complicate her plans.
metadata.Actors: Claudette Colbert, David Newell, Nellie Savage
